## Phase 2 — Backend Configuration (Story P1)

- [ ] [T-016] [P] Create OpenAI account and get API key
- [ ] [T-017] [P] Create Qdrant Cloud account, create cluster, get URL + API key
- [ ] [T-018] [P] Create Neon account, create database, get connection string
- [ ] [T-019] Copy `backend/.env.example` to `backend/.env`
- [ ] [T-020] Fill in all 3 API keys in `backend/.env`
- [ ] [T-021] Run `pip install -r backend/requirements.txt` (in venv)
- [ ] [T-022] Start backend: `uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8000`
- [ ] [T-023] Verify Swagger UI at `http://localhost:8000/docs`

## MVP Scope

Minimum viable submission requires:
- T-008 through T-015 (book deployed)
- T-016 through T-027 (backend working locally)
- T-028 through T-034 (backend + frontend deployed)

Selected text (T-035-037) and polish (T-038-041) are bonus.
